has

is

> going to be hard to convience this is a road they should travel....

messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I am looking for websites on homeschooling/unschooling for my sister....she is considering it with her children but needs tons of information....she
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
I am looking for websites on homeschooling/unschooling for my sister....she
is considering it with her children but needs tons of information....she has
internet access. She lives in a really rural area in the midwess so the
library is not a very good option to reseach books.

Any suggestions? She would like stats. to share with her hubby because he is
going to be hard to convience this is a road they should travel....

Thanks,
Julie
